title.rendered: Fireside Chat with Angel B. Pérez, CEO of NACAC – August 2020

content.rendered:
As institutions continue to examine their financial viability, make efforts to showcase their strong ROI, and forge ahead in redefining themselves, it’s critical we understand how changes in admissions can have lasting effects on our student populations and future talent pipelines.

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Join us for a fireside chat with Christine Cruzvergara and Angel B. Pérez, CEO of the National Association of College Admissions Counseling (NACAC) and former VP of Enrollment Management and Student Success at Trinity College.
